thread.title: Optim LLC and Campbell/Harris Security Equipment Company (CSECO) Announces a New Collaboration
thread.title_full: Optim LLC and Campbell/Harris Security Equipment Company (CSECO) Announces a New Collaboration

author: admin
title: Optim LLC and Campbell/Harris Security Equipment Company (CSECO) Announces a New Collaboration
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/11/2015 @ 2:08 PM   Optim LLC 
STURBRIDGE, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Optim LLC, the manufacturer of the FreedomView Fiberscope FV680, is pleased to announce a new collaboration with CSECO, the manufacturer of the CT-30 and Buster Contraband Detection Kits. This collaboration brings together two award-winning companies that supply high quality inspection equipment to those who serve and protect our country and its borders. The companies will work together to market each company’s fiberscope, density meter and contraband detection products to security professionals. The collaboration will allow each company to more effectively supply a wider range of products to their customers. 
Optim LLC develops, manufactures and supports state-of-the-art endoscopy products and accessories that help medical professionals, law enforcement officers and industrial users work more effectively and efficiently. Optim’s breakthrough flexible fiberscopes with integrated LED lighting enable customers to bring precision optical capabilities wherever they are needed. CSECO has manufactured and delivered over 7,500 Buster Contraband Detection Kits to law enforcement agencies in the United States and around the world. The “Buster” has become the gold standard for density meters and contraband detection by US government agencies, as well as local and domestic law enforcement agencies in the US and abroad.
